channel.title: terraform on masoudkf
channel.description: Recent content in terraform on masoudkf

item.title: AWS DynamoDB CRUD with Boto3
item.description: We create a DynamoDB table with Terraform, and perform CRUD operations using the AWS SDK for Python (Boto3).

item.title: AWS Lambda with Terraform
item.description: We create a Lambda function with Terraform to run a simple Hello World application.
